name: CR-X
overview:
CR-X Big Data Integration System is an extreme transaction processing and data integration/transformation platform. It performs millions of transactions per second. It feeds Rating Engines, Data Warehouses and On Line Analytics Processing Systems. CR-X is the undisputed, fastest Data Integration platform for Extract Transform Load (ETL) as well as unstructured data ever built and operates in Real-Time as well as batch. The CR-X Transformation Engine is used worldwide by Telecommunications Carriers to undertake mediation,network quality, customer experience reporting, revenue assurance and fraud detection, as well as the Retail Banking, Utilities and Health Industries. Streaming data integration and transformation at lightning speed Capable of processing over 100,000 multi-platform transactions per second, per core, CR-X is recognized as the world’s fastest data integration engine. The CR-X engine is the hub for future-focused business-driven organisations. This advanced ‘Five Nines’ uptime, scalable technology guarantees real-time access to up-to-the-minute data and to the analytics most relevant to your business. What really sets us apart is how we cost-effectively manage the transformation. This is the very reason why leading telco, finance, health, utility and travel companies consider us to be the change maker in Big Data integration.

CR-X runs on simple, low cost commodity server & desktop x86 hardware, including virtual server farms. Operating system independent (Open standards) Handles extremely large file sizes & volumes – processes compressed files Handles files with varying record types Deciphers non-conventional data formats – structured & non-structured Does not require an underlying database to support processing Provides ultra fast real-time & batch speeds – no latency 100-1000x faster Converts field and file formats in memory Self-documenting, simple to install, learn & use Embedded project management & version control Self-contained job scheduler and statistics server
